DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this protocol is to investigate the safety and tolerability of AZD1152 when given as a continuous 7-day infusion every week and every 2 weeks in patients with advanced solid malignancies.
DOC.brief_title: AZD1152 in Patients With Advanced Solid Malignancies-Study 3
DOC.criteria: Histological or cytological confirmation of a solid, malignant tumour Participation in an investigational drug study within 21 days prior to entry or who have not recovered from the effects of an investigational study drug Treatment with radiotherapy/chemotherapy with 4 weeks of first dose Recent major surgery within 4 weeks prior to entry to the study
